    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldMesh

        public WorldMesh(World world,
                 ModelTexture texture)
        Creates a mesh of a world from the given world.
        Parameters:
        world - world to create the mesh from.
        texture - sheet with textures of the cubes

    • Method Detail

      • recreateMesh

        public void recreateMesh()
        Recreates the whole mesh, after updates to the world. TODO: this method is not optimized.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Deletes all loaded resources. Call after the world is no longer needed.

      • putVertices

        public int putVertices(float tx,
                       float ty,
                       float tz,
                       int offset,
                       BlockType type,
                       boolean[] sides)
        Creates cube data and puts it into buffers for one mesh.
        Parameters:
        tx - x coordinate of the cube to create.
        ty - y coordinate of the cube to create.
        tz - z coordinate of the cube to create.
        offset - number of indices
        type - the BlockType of the cube to add to the mesh.
        sides - array containing the values for the cubes order: left, right, top, bottom, before, behind
        Returns:
        number of vertices added

      • getNumberOfVertices

        public int getNumberOfVertices()
        Number of vertices in the mesh.
        Returns:
        number of vertices.

      • getNumberOfCubes

        public int getNumberOfCubes()
        Number of cubes in the mesh
        Returns:
        the number of cubes in the mesh
